# Load data
```{r, messages = FALSE}
#install.packages("mdsr")
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

Problem Statement: Are sequels more common today than they used to be?

```{r}
# find any movies that are denoted sequels by the use of "2"
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT * 
            FROM title
            WHERE kind_id IN (1,3,4)
            AND title LIKE '%_ 2';")"
```
